casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. WELLSTON CITY SCHOOL DIST. BD. OF EDN.
v.
OHIO FACILITIES CONSTR. COMM. 2017-1709 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 7, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On relator's amended motion for leave to file amended complaint. Motion granted. On respondent's motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. O'Donnell, Kennedy, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur. O'Connor, C.J., and French and Fischer, JJ., dissent and would deny the motion to dismiss and grant an alternative writ.
